item.description:
Saturday brunch! Bring waffle toppings and brunch sides. Check out www.waffleparty.com for ideas and inspiration!

Let's expand the boundaries of waffle topping possibilities, going beyond traditional maple syrup. Waffles can harmonize with ingredients including spices, veggies, curries and tofu. Especially brave guests should bring toppings they may have thought about, but never mustered the courage to try. In the company of other gastronomic pioneers, we will freely experiment and achieve waffle-icious culinary nirvana.

If you have a waffle iron, bring that, too! We will provide coffee, tea, and a couple different waffle batters.
item.name: Vegan Waffle Frolic
